Source.Name: tree
Source.Summary: list contents of directories in a tree-like format.
Source.Description: Tree is a recursive directory listing command that produces a depth indented listing of files, which is colorized ala dircolors if the LS_COLORS environment variable is set and output is to tty

Package.Name: tree
Package.Summary: list contents of directories in a tree-like format.
Package.Description: Tree is a recursive directory listing command that produces a depth indented listing of files, which is colorized ala dircolors if the LS_COLORS environment variable is set and output is to tty
